name: Colony Collapse LD42
description:
Colony Collapse

A catastrophic failure of the AI system has led to the shutdown of the robot workforce. Just before they went offline they managed to destroy the communication system. Your only hope for your station is to last the thirty days until the next inspection.

Be careful though, because every so often new people will arrive, not realizing that the station is malfunctioning. Don't let the trash build up too much, and make sure your people are kept healthy and you might just keep your job.

-- Controls --

W,A,S,D - moves the camera around

Left click - selects objects and places buildings

Right click - deselects your selection

Mouse wheel - controls zoom

-- Credits --

Elayune - Programming, some design

DrGenghis - Art, Music, Programming, Design
